requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster while you have 3 face-up Omega Psychic and/or Psychic Type monsters on your field.

effect.en: All face-up monsters on your field gain 200 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can choose 1 face-up Effect Monster on your opponent's field. If you do, your opponent cannot activate the chosen monster's effects this turn.
